metadata.title: CVE-2020-16589 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A head-based buffer overflow exists in Academy Software Foundation OpenEXR2.3.0 in writeTileData in ImfTiledOutputFile.cpp that can cause a denial ofservice via a crafted EXR file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16589` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr24 - 2.3.0-6ubuntu0.3
openexr - 2.3.0-6ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-6ubuntu0.3').
